roleset.name: recalculate, reckon, think
roleset.note: RECALCULATE-V NOTES: No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'think' (from recalculate.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Analysts recalculate Cray Computer's initial book value at about $4.75 a share.

example.name: no attribute
example.text: He recalculates that the recent market slide translated into a 5% to 7% reduction in IPO proceeds to companies.
example.arg: that the recent market slide translated into a 5% to 7% reduction in IPO proceeds to companies
